summary: Private detective Sam Ruben's clever plan falls apart with the onset of amnesia. Everyone is trying to kill him and he doesn't know why. The classic film noir milieu now comes to you in the form of an animated feature.
cast: Mark Keller|Bettina Devin|Roger Jackson|Jeff Atik|Kristina Negrete|Victoria Ryan O'Toole|Elaine A. Clark|Amy Provenzano
director: Directors: D. Jud Jones, Risto Topaloski
title: Film Noir
